configuration.description: Enter the settings for deploying the Content Engine application to the application server.

property.name: BootstrappedContentEngineEar
property.description: Enter the absolute path to the directory where you want to place the modified Content Engine EAR file after the bootstrap properties have been added to the EAR file. The default path is C:\CPITinstaller\install-scripts\profiles\XTDeployNew\ear\Engine-ws.ear.

property.name: ApplicationName
property.description: Enter the Content Engine application name as it will appear in the application server, for example in an administration console. The application name is subject to application server naming constraints. For WebSphere Application Server, each application in a cell must have a unique name. The default name is FileNetEngine.

property.name: ApplicationServerNode
property.description: Enter the name of the WebSphere Application Server node where Content Engine is deployed. The name is case-sensitive.

property.name: ApplicationServerName
property.description: Enter the name of the WebSphere Application Server server where Content Engine is deployed. The name is case-sensitive.

property.name: ApplicationServerVirtualHost
property.description: Enter the name of the WebSphere Application Server virtual host where Content Engine is deployed. The name is case-sensitive.

property.name: Script
property.description: Enter the script to use to accomplish a particular configuration task.

property.name: tempDir
property.description: Enter the absolute path to a temporary directory to be used by the configuration task, for example, c:\Program Files\IBM\FileNet\ContentEngine\tools\configure\tmp.
